title: YosemiteRevert 1.5 – Reverts icons and UI elements to those of prior OS X versions
content: YosemiteRevert changes application icons, system icons (such as the folder icon), menu bar icons, and more, as well as the system font, in OS X 10.10 Yosemite back to the way they were in prior versions of OS X.   Version 1.5: Changes By popular request, YosemiteRevert now allows users to choose which changes to […]

title: Flyhunter Origins 1.0 – Exciting adventure game
content: Meet Zak; a bumbling alien spaceship Janitor and wannabe Flyhunter. Zak is a “Zursk”- one of three alien species from Burgarol 3. He works on board the Flyhunter Crew’s legendary spaceship; ‘The Frog’ but deep down he longs for an exciting adventure of his own.   Somewhere in Earth’s orbit, while the heroic Flyhunters are […]

title: Emulsion 1.1.5 – Photo library catalog
content: Emulsion is a new photo catalog app. Emulsion can adjust exposure, colors, and almost everything else. You can also add gradients to your images to darken skies, or even add dust and scratches for a cool retro look. Emulsion can apply adjustments, effects, and metadata changes to one or hundreds of images at once. Want […]

title: Annotate 2.0.7 – Screenshot capture and annotation tool (was Glui)
content: Annotate (was Glui) is the simplest way to capture, annotate and share screenshots.   This is a complete rewrite that builds on what made Glui popular and adds some of the most requested features. It’s way faster, far better, and most importantly, just as simple.   Key features: Capture a screenshot or drag and drop […]

title: Adobe Flash Professional CC 2015 15.0 – Creating advanced interactive content
content: Flash CC 2015 lets you share work directly from within the application and get access to new features the moment they’re released. Your entire creative world, together in one place. title: Adobe Edge Animate CC 2015 6.0 – Web design tools to add motion to web graphics

title: Voilabits DVDRipper 4.1.0 – Easily rip and convert DVDs
content: Voilabits DVDRipper is a reliable and efficient Mac DVD ripping software to decrypt, rip, copy and convert DVDs.
